title: 6 killed, thousands evacuated as storm batters Central and Eastern Europe
content: Four died in Romania and one in Poland, and a firefighter in Austria was killed responding to floods. The storm is expected to linger over Europe for days.
summary: Four died in Romania and one in Poland, and a firefighter in Austria was killed responding to floods. The storm is expected to linger over Europe for days.

title: Houthis fire missile from Yemen into central Israel
content: Yemeni-based Houthi militants claimed responsibility for the attack on Sunday. Israeli forces said the missile did not cause any direct injuries.
summary: Yemeni-based Houthi militants claimed responsibility for the attack on Sunday. Israeli forces said the missile did not cause any direct injuries.

title: Paris closes out its Olympic summer with dazzling Champions Parade
content: The Champions Parade for the Paris Olympic and Paralympic Games included a march down the Champs-Élysées and a medal ceremony led by President Emmanuel Macron.
summary: The Champions Parade for the Paris Olympic and Paralympic Games included a march down the Champs-Élysées and a medal ceremony led by President Emmanuel Macron.

title: Indigenous Colombian coca company challenges Coca-Cola’s trademark
content: Coca Nasa, producer of Coca Pola, or coca beer, says it’s motivated by what it claims is bullying by the beverage giant.
summary: Coca Nasa, producer of Coca Pola, or coca beer, says it’s motivated by what it claims is bullying by the beverage giant.

title: Taliban begins enforcing new draconian laws, and Afghan women despair
content: Afghan religious police wield new power to enforce a ban on women raising their voices in public and looking at men other than their husbands or relatives.
summary: Afghan religious police wield new power to enforce a ban on women raising their voices in public and looking at men other than their husbands or relatives.

title: Under the missiles: U.N. force caught between Israel and Hezbollah
content: When Israel and Hezbollah attack each other, the UNIFIL peacekeeping force takes cover.
summary: When Israel and Hezbollah attack each other, the UNIFIL peacekeeping force takes cover.

title: Iran’s efforts to reengage with West face new challenges
content: U.S. sanctions over Iran’s missile deal with Russia are unlikely to derail President Masoud Pezeshkian’s efforts to bring his country out of isolation, diplomats say.
summary: U.S. sanctions over Iran’s missile deal with Russia are unlikely to derail President Masoud Pezeshkian’s efforts to bring his country out of isolation, diplomats say.

title: U.K. Labour strategists advise Harris on winning from the center left
content: After Keir Starmer led the Labour Party to a big win in July’s election, U.K. strategists say they have relevant insights to share with Kamala Harris’s campaign.
summary: After Keir Starmer led the Labour Party to a big win in July’s election, U.K. strategists say they have relevant insights to share with Kamala Harris’s campaign.

title: How Mexico is helping Biden and Harris at the U.S. border
content: A major reason for the drop in apprehensions at the border this year: Mexico is stopping migrants well before they reach the border.
summary: A major reason for the drop in apprehensions at the border this year: Mexico is stopping migrants well before they reach the border.

title: Four Islamic State leaders killed in August raid in Iraq, U.S. says
content: Military officials said those killed in a dramatic mission by U.S. and Iraqi forces last month included the extremist group’s head of operations in Iraq.
summary: Military officials said those killed in a dramatic mission by U.S. and Iraqi forces last month included the extremist group’s head of operations in Iraq.

title: Russia expels U.K. diplomats; Putin warns against deep strikes with Western weapons
content: The Russian president issued his sternest warning to date about the use of Western weapons in Ukraine ahead of a meeting of British and U.S. leaders.
summary: The Russian president issued his sternest warning to date about the use of Western weapons in Ukraine ahead of a meeting of British and U.S. leaders.

title: Pope Francis says Harris and Trump are ‘against life’
content: Donald Trump and Kamala Harris’s immigration and abortion stances drew a stern response from Pope Francis, who advised Catholics in the U.S. to choose the “lesser evil.”
summary: Donald Trump and Kamala Harris’s immigration and abortion stances drew a stern response from Pope Francis, who advised Catholics in the U.S. to choose the “lesser evil.”

title: U.S. says Russian state media outlet runs intelligence operations
content: The State Department accuses RT, the Russian media outlet, of running intelligence operations and procuring weapons for the war in Ukraine.
summary: The State Department accuses RT, the Russian media outlet, of running intelligence operations and procuring weapons for the war in Ukraine.
